data.why:
DBISimple - Wrapper for DBI functions that allows you to automate
    some of the common tasks as setting up your db connections, logging,
    building queries and simple data retrieval. DBISimple acts as a
    custom data abstraction layer for db driven applications.
    StringLookup - A simple way to do utilize lookup tables that are in
    BDB or text files. DirStore - Allows for data storage and retrieval
    using file system directory structure. AppXMLConfig - Module for
    configuration management using XML configuration file. Supports
    fairly complicated configurations.
